BodyName: Committee on Fire and Emergency Management

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of a program to provide reduced cost or no cost lithium-ion batteries used in powered mobility devices
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of a program to provide reduced cost or no cost lithium-ion batteries used in powered mobility devices.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring businesses using bicycles for commercial purposes to provide bicycle operators with fireproof or fire-resistant containers for removable storage batteries used to power motor-assisted bicycles
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring businesses using bicycles for commercial purposes to provide bicycle operators with fireproof or fire-resistant containers for removable storage batteries used to power motor-assisted bicycles.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of a program to provide reduced cost or no cost lithium-ion batteries used in powered mobility devices
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of a program to provide reduced cost or no cost lithium-ion batteries used in powered mobility devices.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring businesses using bicycles for commercial purposes to provide bicycle operators with fireproof or fire-resistant containers for removable storage batteries used to power motor-assisted bicycles
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring businesses using bicycles for commercial purposes to provide bicycle operators with fireproof or fire-resistant containers for removable storage batteries used to power motor-assisted bicycles.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Brewer and Powers
